divs: Sighting Detailsit was aprox 10;20 pm on the 24th of july 2008 when my dog barked at something outside, when i went out i could not see anything until a bright star like light was stationary above . at first i thought it was a star but it began moving to the left. slowly at first and then it would vary its speed by increasing its speed in small bursts then slowing again it was totally silent and did not carry any flashing beacons and continued on its course in an arc. it also seemed to cross in front of a approaching airliner which was landing at the local airport, (4 miles away) i have no explanation as to what i saw but 3 days later 200 sightings have been reported in the uk.i unfortunatly never had the idea of photographing the object and seemed gone before i knew it
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Derby
There were no other sightings in Derby on or around July 24th 2008
